com.tambapps.gmage

Class GmageDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tambapps.gmage.GmageDecoder

  • public final class GmageDecoder
extends Object
    Class providing functions to decode a Gmage from many kinds of objects

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public static com.tambapps.gmage.Gmage decode(Object object)
                                       throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                                              com.tambapps.gmage.exception.GmageDecodingException
        Tries to decode a Bitmap from an Object
        Parameters:
        object - the object to decode
        Returns:
        the decoded Gmage
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - in case the object could not be converted
        com.tambapps.gmage.exception.GmageDecodingException - in case an error occurred during the decoding

      • decode

        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap to decode
        Returns:
        the decoded Gmage
        Throws:

      • decode

        public static com.tambapps.gmage.Gmage decode(String string)
                                       throws com.tambapps.gmage.exception.GmageDecodingException
        Decode Gmage from a string. The string can either be a file path, an URL or a Base64 string
        Parameters:
        string - the string to decode
        Returns:
        the decoded Gmage
        Throws:
        com.tambapps.gmage.exception.GmageDecodingException - in case an error occurred during the decoding
